name: Orkla ASA
goal:
Orkla is a leading developer, marketer and supplier of strong proprietary brands and concepts.

The Nordic and Baltic region is Orkla's domestic market, besides which the business area has established strong market positions in other European countries and India. At the end of 2016, Orkla employed a workforce equivalent to 18,100 man-years and has approx. 100 production facilities in 18 countries.

The business area bases its strategy and organisation on a multi-local model, where responsibility for value creation and decision-making lies at the local level with the individual companies.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
